channel.title: Comments on: Now if only there was something useful to buy.
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Haggisandhorses
item.dc:creator: Haggisandhorses
item.description: For real, or something with a genuinely good discount where I don't still have to pay money.
item.content:encoded: For real, or something with a genuinely good discount where I don’t still have to pay money.

item.title: By: bucket_of_coal

item.description: PBI hands down is one of the best outfits in the game
